channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Two ways to profit from Trump's foreign policy -- regardless of whether it works
Lowe's reports first same-store sales rise in two years
First measles death is reported in the West Texas outbreak that’s infected more than 120 people
item.description: Measles is a respiratory virus that can survive in the air for up to two hours. Up to 9 out of 10 people who are susceptible will get the virus if exp...

item.title: GM boosts investor payout with new buybacks, dividend hike
item.description: GM said the buyback has no expiration date but that it aims to complete the first $2 billion in repurchases by the end of the second quarter.

item.title: Nvidia’s earnings could play out in one of these three ways — live coverage
Nvidia’s shaken aura of invincibility is set for an earnings test
item.description: "I'm not overly optimistic this will be the kind of report we’ve seen a lot from Nvidia ... That could lead to a massive selloff.”

item.title: IRS refunds are 32% lower on average so far this tax season
I was sleeping in a Walmart parking lot. Now I own a company
item.description: Keith Dixon's life turned around after he joined an employee-owned company—and an employee stock ownership plan.

item.title: Budweiser brewer is selling less beer and making more money
Nasdaq and S&P bounce back from 4-day losing streaks with Nvidia earnings on tap
